translation: Blitz will unlock when you reach Player Level 12.

Win battles in Blitz to earn Blitz Points and complete milestones and earn rank rewards! Points earned for winning a battle are determined by the Power of your opponent's team and your Blitz Points multiplier. Your current tier determines your Points multiplier.
Reach {points} points to earn rank rewards
